%c[pda_white]Bookworm Food%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to unlock all articles for the in-game guide.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Articles can be unlocked through a multitude of ways, such as talking to important characters or downloading data from memory sticks.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
All future memory sticks which would be found on the bodies of dead stalkers will be replaced by rare PDAs.
 
Should extra articles be added after unlocking this achievement, such as via a patch or a mod, then this effect will be temporarily disabled so that memory sticks can be obtained again.

%c[pda_white]Completionist%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to unlock all other available achievements.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Double the amount of rank points compared to when you normally unlock an achievement.

%c[pda_white]Down to Earth%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to destroy either 3 helicopters with small arms, or just 1 if you use an explosive weapon such as the RPG or RG-6.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Mi-24 "Hind" helicopters will gradually be replaced with the weaker Mi-2 "Hoplite".

%c[pda_white]Duga Free%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to disable both the Miracle Machine and the Brain Scorcher.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Yantar and Radar will become much easier to travel through after said psy-field emitters are disabled.

%c[pda_white]Geologist%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to detect a minimum of 50 artefacts.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Artefact detection requires a detector, which are sold by most traders.
By using them near an anomaly, there is a chance you may detect an artefact.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Respawn rates for artefacts found in anomalies will be slightly increased.

%c[pda_white]Heavy Pockets%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to possess 10,000,000 RU at any one moment.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Most traders will begin to offer you special supplies which would only otherwise be available if you had great relations with their faction.

%c[pda_white]Infopreneur%c[ui_gray_1] requires to you deliver a minimum of 50 PDAs to information brokers.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
PDAs can be found on the bodies of dead stalkers, and can be traded to information brokers by telling them that you have information to sell.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Information brokers will offer you a slightly increased reward for any future PDAs you bring them.

%c[pda_white]Mechanized Warfare%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to deliver all 3 sets of tools to a single technician.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Basic, advanced, and expert tools can be found mostly in stashes, but can also on occasion be found with other stalkers.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Bonus items used in repairs are more effective.

%c[pda_white]Folk Hero%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to achieve the highest possible rank.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Rank can be earned through almost every action that you can take in the Zone.
An article explaining ranks and how they work can be found in the Features category.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You will be able to recruit 2 additional companions above the regular limit.

%c[pda_white]Radiotherapy%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to survive 25 emissions and 25 psi-storms.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Emissions and psi-storms occur at random intervals, which can be altered through the weather options section of the main menu.
 
Both of these features can be toggled at any time during a playthrough, but will need to be enabled in order for you to earn this achievement.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
There is a small chance that you will survive an emission or a psi-vortex without taking cover.

%c[pda_white]Rag and Bone%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to loot (at least partially) a minimum of 100 stashes.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Stashes can be found almost anywhere in the Zone at any time, but receiving their coordinates after completing tasks will mark them on your map.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
The maximum total value of items found in newly generated stashes will be slightly increased.

%c[pda_white]Silver or Lead%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to either kill 500 stalkers, or make 50 stalkers surrender to you.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
The requirements for this achievement will likely be met through normal gameplay, but if you are deliberately trying to unlock it, be careful not to kill neutral or friendly stalkers if you value your reputation.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Surrendering stalkers may sometimes give you coordinates to an additional stash location.

%c[pda_white]Tourist%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to visit all 33 levels in the Zone.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You will receive coordinates for 3 unique stashes.

%c[pda_white]Well Dressed%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to either kill 500 mutants, or field dress 250 mutant parts.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You can skin mutants faster.

%c[pda_white]Wishful Thinking%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to complete the "Living Legend" storyline.
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You will unlock "Renegades" as a playable faction.

%c[pda_white]Infantile Pleasure%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to smash 200 boxes. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
The requirements for this achievement will likely be met through normal gameplay. Boxes can be found nearly everywhere around the Zone. Industrial locations have plenty of them. 
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Boxes will have a 25% chance of containing more items.

%c[pda_white]Vigilant Recycler%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to disassemble 200 items. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
The majority of items can be disassembled into base materials. A specific tool such as the Swiss Knife or Multitool are used for the process. 
An article can be found on the subject in the Features category. 
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You'll have a 33% chance of obtaining an extra part from disassembling.

%c[pda_white]Artificer Eagerness%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to craft 50 items. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Crafting toolkits can be found in stashes or with other stalkers' belongings; some have recipes and/or guides that provide information for a wider set of equipment to craft. 
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Many advanced crafting recipes will require less components.

%c[pda_white]Unforeseen Guest%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to have a total of 5 disguise hours while being watched. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
You can disguise yourself by wearing outfits from other factions. An article can be found on the subject in the Features category. 
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
Your actions while under disguise will draw less suspicion.

%c[pda_white]Absolver%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to complete the "Mortal Sin" storyline. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
This achievement is available only for Story mode. 
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You will unlock "Sin" as a playable faction.

%c[pda_white]Collaborator%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to complete the "Operation Afterglow" storyline. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
This achievement is available only for Story mode. 
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You will unlock "UNISG" as a playable faction.

%c[pda_white]Iron Curtain%c[ui_gray_1] requires your faction to have the upper hand in in Zone by capturing half the territories. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
This achievement is available only for Warfare mode. 
Underground levels are ignored. 
 
%c[pda_blue]Rewards%c[ui_gray_1] 
You will receive a large amount of roubles as spoils of war.

%c[pda_white]Murky Spirit%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to complete all three "Lost to the Zone" storylines in Ironman mode. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
This achievement is available only for Story mode. But most importantly, Ironman mode must be active during the entirety of your playthrough.

%c[pda_white]Invictus%c[ui_gray_1] requires you to do the impossible: 
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_1]Play on Story mode, complete all three "Lost to the Zone" storylines 
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_1]Ironman mode must be active since day 1 in the Zone, until you complete the storlines. 
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_1]Play on the hardest gameplay and progression difficulties, without changing any of their settings. 
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_1]Never die twice on your journey. 
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_1]Never use debug mode. 
 
Have fun.
